content: farfetch d crochet pattern pattern by *brinady* this is a free pattern you may share it freely and sell the items you make please do not sell the pattern it is a free pattern materials needed medium weight brown yarn medium weight ivory yarn medium weight yellow yarn medium weight white yarn medium weight light green yarn medium weight green yarn 2 black plastic eyes painted felt or carefully sewn black yarn can be substituted to reduce choking hazard for young children dark brown felt 4mm crochet hook yarn needle stuffing abbreviations st- stitches increase- increase single_crochet- single_crochet decrease- decrease sl- slip_stitch half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet chain- chain stitch f/o- finish off body in ivory and brown 1 starting in ivory magic_ring with 6st 6 2 increase around 12 3 increase around 24 <change to brown> 4-8 12sc <change to ivory> 12sc <change to brown> 5 rounds 24 9 2sc decrease three times <change to ivory> 2sc decrease three times <change to brown> 18 10 single_crochet decrease three times <change to ivory> single_crochet decrease three times <change to brown> 12 <time to stuff it> 11 decrease around 6 f/o and leave a tail sew it closed head in brown 1 magic_ring with 6st 6 2 increase around 12 3 single_crochet increase around 18 4-7 single_crochet around 4 rounds 18 8 decrease around 9 <time to stuff it> f/o and sew the open circle onto the top of the body feet in yellow make 2 2ch turn sl into the 2nd chain 2ch turn single_crochet sl into the same stitch as the previous sl 3 times f/o and leave a tail for sewing sew onto the body left wing grasping the leek in brown <worked flat> 1 10ch turn 2 skip 1ch 9sl chain turn 3 skip the chain 7sl 3ch turn 4 skip the first chain 9sl chain turn 5 skip the chain 7sl 3ch turn 6 skip the first chain 9sl chain turn 7 skip the chain 6sc chain f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sew the base of the wing to the body position the leek under the wing and sew through the leek to attach the wing leek and body left wing back against the body in brown <worked flat> 1 10ch turn 2 skip 1ch 9sl chain turn 3 skip the chain 7sl 3ch turn 4 skip the first chain 9sl 2sl into the sides of the two previous row chain turn 5 skip the chain 9sl 3ch turn 6 skip the first chain 11sl sl into the side of the first row chain turn 7 skip the chain 9sc chain f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sew the base and sides of the wing to the front of the body tail in brown 1 magic_ring with 6st 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet around 9 4 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet twice in same stitch twice 5sc 11 5 7sc f/o leave a tail for sewing stuff and sew onto the body beak in
